messages: d3b120294c368abbf695fabf42c5737f (07:29): hello
d3b120294c368abbf695fabf42c5737f (07:29): anyone know which of these is better? Viper V770 ATX AGP 32mb vs Voodoo3 16MB vs TNT2/Ultra 32MB
1995f89f9a61d75acd0d00c8fbc96481 (07:47): anyone here use a kodac easyshare cx 7530?
c72dbdf529e69c1ae3fed7f262edaa92 (07:48): it's the v770 a tnt2 also
c72dbdf529e69c1ae3fed7f262edaa92 (07:48): voodoo3 is worthless for 2k or xp
c72dbdf529e69c1ae3fed7f262edaa92 (07:48): so there's your choice already if you use windows
d3b120294c368abbf695fabf42c5737f (07:51): v770 = tnt2 as well?
d3b120294c368abbf695fabf42c5737f (07:51): if so, this guy put in 2 tnt2's in the same pc, lol.
c72dbdf529e69c1ae3fed7f262edaa92 (07:54): you can do that
c72dbdf529e69c1ae3fed7f262edaa92 (07:54): for multiple desktop in 2k, xp or linux
c72dbdf529e69c1ae3fed7f262edaa92 (07:54): the v770 might not be a ultra
c72dbdf529e69c1ae3fed7f262edaa92 (07:54): so the ultra would be the fastest
d3b120294c368abbf695fabf42c5737f (07:56): tnt2 might be ultra? hm
c72dbdf529e69c1ae3fed7f262edaa92 (08:02): <rtj> anyone know which of these is better? Viper V770 ATX AGP 32mb vs Voodoo3 16MB vs TNT2/Ultra 32MB
c72dbdf529e69c1ae3fed7f262edaa92 (08:02): you said th eone is a ultra
c72dbdf529e69c1ae3fed7f262edaa92 (08:02): if the viper v770 isn't a ultra then the ultra one will be faster
c72dbdf529e69c1ae3fed7f262edaa92 (08:02): don't toss the voodoo3 btw it's a good card fro linux
0890cb2c97add87411ed7ff48f6ddb92 (08:03): we need a quote bot just for that
9c98af909f1130c4e56eda05bbfca225 (08:04): "good card"
d3b120294c368abbf695fabf42c5737f (08:04): another thing
d3b120294c368abbf695fabf42c5737f (08:04): when using these oldschool video cards
d3b120294c368abbf695fabf42c5737f (08:04): would i need to get drivers for em?
d3b120294c368abbf695fabf42c5737f (08:05): or are the default windows ones enough?
c72dbdf529e69c1ae3fed7f262edaa92 (08:05): well nvidia's latest drivers claim to work with their tnt2 and up
c72dbdf529e69c1ae3fed7f262edaa92 (08:05): but they seem to cause problems so you might have to experiemtn with different versions
c72dbdf529e69c1ae3fed7f262edaa92 (08:06): ask around
c72dbdf529e69c1ae3fed7f262edaa92 (08:06): depends what you want them for
d3b120294c368abbf695fabf42c5737f (08:06): counterstrike?
c72dbdf529e69c1ae3fed7f262edaa92 (08:06): you might want drivers for that :)
d3b120294c368abbf695fabf42c5737f (08:06): one last thing, FRAPS = universal game FPS?
d3b120294c368abbf695fabf42c5737f (08:06): i've never used it.. just heard of it
c72dbdf529e69c1ae3fed7f262edaa92 (08:07): nope
c72dbdf529e69c1ae3fed7f262edaa92 (08:07): I haven't gamed in yrs
c72dbdf529e69c1ae3fed7f262edaa92 (08:11): feel free to idle here any time
d3b120294c368abbf695fabf42c5737f (08:33): for nvidia, in CS do i select software, opengl, or direct3d?
c72dbdf529e69c1ae3fed7f262edaa92 (08:34): try both

d3b120294c368abbf695fabf42c5737f (08:40): geforce 2 = PERFECT GFX in CS 1.6
